attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All road charges including road tax should be paid for at the petrol pumps. This would then reduce the school run & non essencial short journeys that clog up the roads increasing congestion. This way all pay even the individuals that dont pay road tax or insurance.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
